scripts.prespardadev: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://localhost:8080 ../../sparda-landingpage/website/; node render.js -u=http://localhost:8080 ../../sparda-landingpage/website/
scripts.prespardatest: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://einfach-teo.surge.sh ../../sparda-landingpage/website/; node render.js -u=http://einfach-teo.surge.sh ../../sparda-landingpage/website/
scripts.spardabuild: node minify.js; node minify.js -p -u=http://einfach-teo.finnoconsult.at  ../../sparda-landingpage/website/; node render.js -u=http://einfach-teo.finnoconsult.at ../../sparda-landingpage/website/
scripts.prespardadeploy: yarn cleanpublic;yarn spardabuild; echo 'remember to create backup with [yarn spardabackup] command at least the first daily deploy'
